subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Cheating
Alpine Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Marcel Hirscher, 22, won a World Cup slalom on home soil Tuesday after being disqualified and fined at the last two slalom competitions for straddling gates.
snippet: Marcel Hirscher, 22, won a World Cup slalom on home soil Tuesday after being disqualified and fined at the last two slalom competitions for straddling gates.
